rules_text: When Vanessa's Forerunner enters or attacks, it connives. [i](Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Choose one –
• Draw a card, then discard a card.
• Put a -1/-1 counter onto target creature.
• You gain 2 life.
